titleStmt.title: Misochymias elenchos, or, A check given to the insolent garrulity of Henry Stubbe in vindication of my Lord Bacon and the author : with an assertion of experimental philosophy : also some practical observations exhibited for the credit of the true chymical science : by George Thomson ...
titleStmt.author: Thomson, George, 17th cent.

notesStmt.note: In answer to Henry Stubbe's The Lord Bacon's relation of the sweating-sickness examined. Cf. DNB.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
